name: file-distribution
label: File Distribution
description: Gear that distributes files to target projects
author: NACC

dry_run.description: Whether to do a dry run

apikey_path_prefix.description: The instance specific AWS parameter path prefix for apikey

target_project.description: Label of target project to distribute file to; all target ADCIDs expected to have a project

staging_project_id.description: Staging project ID to stage all results to; overrides target_project

associated_csv_regex.description: If provided, searches for an associated CSV that contains the string returned by running this regex on the input filename. Ignored if writing to a staging project.

adcid_key.description: Column name from the associated CSV with the ADCIDs

include.description: Comma-delimited list of ADCIDs to include

exclude.description: Comma-delimited list of ADCIDs to exclude

batch_size.description: Number of centers to batch; will wait for all downstream pipelines to finish running for a given batch before writing others

downstream_gears.description: If scheduling, comma-delimited string of downstream gears to wait for
